thread.title: LIVE UPDATES: Oroville spillway collapse feared, evacuations ordered
thread.title_full: LIVE UPDATES: Oroville spillway collapse feared, evacuations ordered

title: LIVE UPDATES: Oroville spillway collapse feared, evacuations ordered
text:
February 12, 2017 7:08 PM LIVE UPDATES: Oroville spillway collapse feared, evacuations ordered Cars start to pull into the Silver Dollar Fairgrounds evacuation entrance in Chico after the mandatory evacuation of low levels of Oroville and areas downstream from the Oroville Dam after a hazardous situation developed with the auxiliary spillway. Severe erosion compromised the auxiliary spillway. Photograph taken roughly 5:30 p.m. Sunday, February 12, 2017. Lisa Roberts Hahn Special to The Sacramento Bee i 
This live blog is displaying updates from emergency services and Sacramento Bee reporters in the Oroville area and regions south affected by the current emergency at the Oroville dam spillway and the evacuations ordered in the Oroville, Marysville and Yuba County areas. Live Blog Emergency evacuations as Oroville dam spillway failing  ;
